page.title: 03LIFE OF L.N.PRICE CONT....
page.content: From 1500 I make or recieve calls from New York or Los Angeles' offices and discuss with my colleague up dating our U.S routes performance monitoring system. I usually finish work at 1800 and arrive home at 1820. Occasionally I attend meetings after work at Gatwick:We eat about 1845 when we can talk together as a whole family, with everyone recounting the events of the day. After dinner I help with the washing up and getting the children ready for bed. Most nights I listen to Mathew read then I read a bedtime story. Some evenings I attend Parent teacher association meetings, otherwise I watch news programmes, films and documentries on television or read newspapers and magazines. I usually go to bed at 2300.
